wikipedia_page.main: Louis Norman Devereux (20 October 1931 – 12 November 2016) was an English cricketer who played first-class cricket between 1949 and 1960. He played his county cricket for Middlesex, Worcestershire and Glamorgan, and also appeared for Combined Services. He was capped by Glamorgan in 1956.
